entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning late in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h then west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
